languages.text: "Так и есть, но халатность это или нет, будет решать Вольный Торговец, а не вы". {n}Губернатор вновь обращается к вам.{/n} "Ваша светлость, примите мои глубочайшие извинения за неосмотрительность. Мной движет только честь и не более того. Я сейчас же пошлю слуг со всеми разобраться..."

traits.locale_text: "Так и есть, но халатность это или нет, будет решать Вольный Торговец, а не вы". {n}Губернатор вновь обращается к вам.{/n} "Ваша светлость, примите мои глубочайшие извинения за неосмотрительность. Мной движет только честь и не более того. Я сейчас же пошлю слуг со всеми разобраться..."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, not you." {n}The governor addresses you once more.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. Nothing matters more to me than my honour. I shall send the servants to deal with all this immediately..."
languages.original_text: "Так и есть, но халатность это или нет, будет решать Вольный Торговец, а не вы". {n}Губернатор вновь обращается к вам.{/n} "Ваша светлость, примите мои глубочайшие извинения за неосмотрительность. Мной движет только честь и не более того. Я сейчас же пошлю слуг со всеми разобраться..."

traits.locale_text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, and not you." {n}Governor addresses you once more.{/n} Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. The only thing that drives me is honour, and nothing else. I shall send the servants to look into the situation right away..."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, and not you." {n}Governor addresses you once more.{/n} Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. The only thing that drives me is honour, and nothing else. I shall send the servants to look into the situation right away..."

The only thing that is driving me is honour, nothing else. I shall send the servants to sort things out right away..."

The only thing that is driving me is honour, nothing else. I shall send the servants to sort things out right away..."

Nothing matters more to me than my honour. I shall send the servants to deal with all this immediately..."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, not you." {n}The governor addresses you once more.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. Nothing matters more to me than my honour. I shall send the servants to deal with all this immediately..."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「それはそうかもしれないが、私の怠慢を糾弾するのは自由開拓者の役目だ。お前のではない」{n}総督は再びあなたと話す。{/n}「陛下、私の軽率な行いを心より謝罪いたします。私にとって名誉ほど大切なものはありません。事件解明のため、ただちに従者を派遣いたしますので…」
languages.original_text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, not you." {n}The governor addresses you once more.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. Nothing matters more to me than my honour. I shall send the servants to deal with all this immediately..."

traits.locale_text: 「それはそうかもしれないが、私の怠慢を糾弾するのは自由開拓者の役目だ。お前のではない」{n}総督は再びあなたと話す。{/n}「陛下、私の軽率な行いを心より謝罪いたします。私にとって名誉ほど大切なものはありません。事件解明のため、ただちに従者を派遣いたしますので…」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “或许如此，但能指责我的只有行商浪人，而不是你。”{n}总督对你开口道。{/n}“大人，请允许我对我的疏失表达最深的歉意。我献给您的只有一片赤诚，别无他物。我会立刻派人处理相关事宜……”
languages.original_text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, not you." {n}The governor addresses you once more.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. Nothing matters more to me than my honour. I shall send the servants to deal with all this immediately..."

traits.locale_text: “或许如此，但能指责我的只有行商浪人，而不是你。”{n}总督对你开口道。{/n}“大人，请允许我对我的疏失表达最深的歉意。我献给您的只有一片赤诚，别无他物。我会立刻派人处理相关事宜……”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Peut-être, mais si quelqu'un doit m'accuser de négligence, c'est {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, et pas vous, {n}dit le gouverneur en se tournant de nouveau vers vous.{/n} Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses pour mon imprudence, Votre Seigneurie. Rien ne compte plus à mes yeux que mon honneur. Je vais immédiatement envoyer des serviteurs sur les lieux... »
languages.original_text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, not you." {n}The governor addresses you once more.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. Nothing matters more to me than my honour. I shall send the servants to deal with all this immediately..."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être, mais si quelqu'un doit m'accuser de négligence, c'est {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, et pas vous, {n}dit le gouverneur en se tournant de nouveau vers vous.{/n} Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses pour mon imprudence, Votre Seigneurie. Rien ne compte plus à mes yeux que mon honneur. Je vais immédiatement envoyer des serviteurs sur les lieux... »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Puede ser, pero es {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quien debe acusarme de negligencia, no usted». {n}El gobernador se dirige a ti una vez más.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, acepte mis más sinceras disculpas por mi imprudencia. Mi honor es lo que más valoro. Mandaré a los sirvientes a resolver el asunto de inmediato...».
languages.original_text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, not you." {n}The governor addresses you once more.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. Nothing matters more to me than my honour. I shall send the servants to deal with all this immediately..."

traits.locale_text: «Puede ser, pero es {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quien debe acusarme de negligencia, no usted». {n}El gobernador se dirige a ti una vez más.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, acepte mis más sinceras disculpas por mi imprudencia. Mi honor es lo que más valoro. Mandaré a los sirvientes a resolver el asunto de inmediato...».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Das mag sein, doch es steht nur {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu, mir Nachlässigkeit vorzuwerfen, nicht Euch." {n}Der Gouverneur richtet das Wort erneut an dich.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte nehmt meine aufrichtige Entschuldigung für meine Unbesonnenheit an. Nichts bedeutet mir mehr als meine Ehre. Ich werde umgehend Diener schicken, um alles zu regeln ..."
languages.original_text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, not you." {n}The governor addresses you once more.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. Nothing matters more to me than my honour. I shall send the servants to deal with all this immediately..."

traits.locale_text: "Das mag sein, doch es steht nur {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu, mir Nachlässigkeit vorzuwerfen, nicht Euch." {n}Der Gouverneur spricht wieder zu dir.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte nehmt meine aufrichtige Entschuldigung für meine Unbesonnenheit an. Mich treibt allein die Ehre an, sonst nichts. Ich werde augenblicklich die Diener losschicken, alles in Ordnung zu bringen ..."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Öyle olsa bile bunu sen değil, yalnızca Hür Tacir Hazretleri yapabilir." {n}Vali tekrar sana dönüyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, tedbirsizliğim için sizden tüm samimiyetimle özür dilerim. Benim için onurumdan değerli bir şey yoktur. Bu meseleyle ilgilenmeleri için derhâl hizmetkârları görevlendireceğim..."
languages.original_text: "It may be so, but it is for the Rogue Trader to accuse me of negligence, not you." {n}The governor addresses you once more.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my deepest apologies for my imprudence. Nothing matters more to me than my honour. I shall send the servants to deal with all this immediately..."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle olsa bile bunu yalnızca Hür Tacir Hazretleri yapabilir, sen değil." {n}Vali tekrar sana dönüyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, tedbirsizliğim için sizden samimiyetle özür dilerim. Benim için onurumdan değerli bir şey yoktur. Bu meseleyle ilgilenmeleri için hizmetkârları hemen göndereceğim..."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
